channel.title: Run Batch File Error
channel.description:
Well I seem to keep getting the system cannot find the path specified. Even though I have my environmental variables set correctly. And the NoClassDefFoundError server, but I have my server.class correct.
Also
When I compile I get Javac: file not found .\src\*java And some more Text.
Any Suggestions here?

item.title: Run Batch File Error
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

I’ll retry with my paths and post some results give me a few minutes

Ok

Ok I have redone the paths. Same Compiling error, but for runserver it now says cannot find path specified 'java is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file press any key to continue…

Read full topic

item.title: Run Batch File Error

item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

deathschaos9:

Post the compiler code and the runserver code if you don’t mind…

Nothing in the compiler / run batch file code would be of relevance to his error; we have all we need to fix in his pasted error except for a layout of his server file directory.
